title: The Shining
author: Stephen King
description: A family becomes isolated in a haunted hotel with terrifying consequences, as the father descends into madness.

title: IT
author: Stephen King
description: A group of childhood friends reunite as adults to confront an ancient evil that returns every 27 years.

title: Misery
author: Stephen King
description: An author is held captive by a deranged fan after a car crash, leading to a psychological battle of wills.

title: Carrie
author: Stephen King
description: A bullied teenage girl with telekinetic powers takes revenge after a cruel prank at her high school prom.

author: Stephen King
description: A time-traveling teacher attempts to prevent the assassination of JFK, but altering the past has consequences.
